title: Chicken Tikka Masala
tagline: Charred chicken in creamy tomato sauce
description: Chicken Tikka Masala - Kenji López-Alt tested
steps: Mix yogurt, lemon juice, 1 tbsp garam masala, cumin, paprika. Marinate chicken 1-4 hours.
Broil chicken until charred, 4-5 minutes per side.
Cook onion in oil 8 minutes. Add garlic, ginger, remaining garam masala. Cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, simmer 15 minutes. Stir in cream.
Add chicken and juices. Simmer 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.
Serve with basmati rice and naan.
notes: Charring under broiler adds authentic flavor.
